alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 6:22PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lowndes and eastern Brooks Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 622 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over I-75 At Exit 16, or near Valdosta. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Park, Valdosta, Hahira, Moody Air Force Base, I-75 At Exit 16, Remerton, Dasher, Morven, Barney, Barretts, Twin Lakes, Valdosta Regional Airport, Kinderlou, I-75 At Exit 5, I-75 At Exit 29, Clyattville, Blue Springs, I-75 At Exit 22 and I-75 At Exit 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
